name: Jungle Boy Adventure
description:
Jungle Boy Adventure is simple 2D Game. You just need to get out of the jungle.

Controls

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

W - Jump

S - (Nothing^^)

LEFT ARROW - Shoot Left

RIGHT ARROW - Shoot right

UP ARROW - Shoot up

DOWN ARROW - Shoot down

TAB - Statistics

ESC - Pause

Unfortunately, game is not perfect. This is my first project in Unity and it has some bugs but.. its playable! Enjoy!
